trigger_prototype.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template EMC Unity REST-API:running.disk.[{#ID}].last()}=6 and {Template EMC Unity REST-API:running.disk.[{#ID}].change()}=1) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template EMC Unity REST-API:running.disk.[{#ID}].change()}=0) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template EMC Unity REST-API:running.disk.[{#ID}].last()}<>8 and {Template EMC Unity REST-API:running.disk.[{#ID}].change()}=1)
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} -> Hard disk "{#ID}" running status is {ITEM.VALUE}

trigger_prototype.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template EMC Unity REST-API:link.ethernetPort.[{#ID}].last()}=11 and {Template EMC Unity REST-API:link.ethernetPort.[{#ID}].change()}=1) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template EMC Unity REST-API:link.ethernetPort.[{#ID}].change()}=0)
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} -> Ethernet Port "{#ID}" running status is {ITEM.VALUE}

item_prototype.name: Health status of Fibre Channel port "{#ID}"
Running status of Fibre Channel port "{#ID}"

trigger_prototype.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template EMC Unity REST-API:link.fcPort.[{#ID}].last()}=11 and {Template EMC Unity REST-API:link.fcPort.[{#ID}].change()}=1) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1) and {Template EMC Unity REST-API:link.fcPort.[{#ID}].change()}=0
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} -> FibreChannel Port "{#ID}" running status is {ITEM.VALUE}

discovery_rule.name: I/O Module
discovery_rule.description: I/O modules provide connectivity between SPs and Disk-Array Enclosures (DAEs)

item_prototype.name: Subscribed size of Pool "{#NAME}" in percent

trigger_prototype.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template EMC Unity REST-API:link.sasPort.[{#ID}].last()}=11 and {Template EMC Unity REST-API:link.sasPort.[{#ID}].change()}=1) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template EMC Unity REST-API:link.sasPort.[{#ID}].change()}=0)
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} -> SAS Port "{#ID}" running status is {ITEM.VALUE}

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} -> No data from storage for 1 hours
